    • Method Detail

      • toFormattedString

        public static java.lang.String toFormattedString(long time,
                                                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Provide the Millisecond time value in {year}y {day}d {hour}h {minute}m {second}s {millisecond}ms {nanoseconds}ns.
        Omitted if there is no value for that unit.
        Parameters:
        time - time value.
        timeUnit - a unit of input time value.
        Returns:
        A formatted string of the time
        Since:
        2018. 1. 9.
